entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 40 km/h becoming east 20 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
